meta.name: title
meta.content: INFORMATION ON THE CORONAVIRUS - Edgewater Park Township School District
INFORMATION ON THE CORONAVIRUS - Edgewater Park Township School District
INFORMATION ON THE CORONAVIRUS - Edgewater Park Township School District

link.title: INFORMATION ON THE CORONAVIRUS - Edgewater Park Township School District

font.span: The District is monitoring this issue closely and doing all we can to keep everyone safe and maintain instruction. Please remember to practice these preventative measures:
Talk to your children about good hygiene practices.

li.font: Wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.
Use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer when soap and water are not available.
Avoid touching eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.
Avoid close contact with people who are sick.
Cough and sneeze into elbows, instead of hands.
Practice social distancing, 6 feet apart from others when possible.
